h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: You need to also be ready for his final slam, which he’ll do with both weapons, but won’t send out a ring. He’s being sneaky here to lure you into advancing on him, but will detonate his weapons after a pause to send out one final quick electric ring!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
You need to also be ready for his final slam, which he’ll do with both weapons, but won’t send out a ring. He’s being sneaky here to lure you into advancing on him, but will detonate his weapons after a pause to send out one final quick electric ring!
